6.72d: Increased Base  Intelligence from 16 to 18. Reduced  Ghostship cooldown from 90 to 90/80/70. Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.81: Increased  Torrent radius from 215 to 225.  X Marks the Spot can now last twice as long on allied heroes (1/2/3/4 -> 2/4/6/8). Increased  Ghostship allied buff duration from 8 to 10. Added an allied only visual area indicator for  Ghostship.
6.82: Rescaled  X Marks the Spot cooldown from 13 to 14/13/12/11.
6.83: X Marks the Spot Can now be cast on spell immune allies. Increased enemy duration from 1/2/3/4 to 4, and allied duration from 2/4/6/8 to 8. Reduced cast range from 500/650/800/950 to 350/550/750/1000. Increased cooldown from 14/13/12/11 to 19/16/13/10. Removed  Return 50 manacost.
6.84: Torrent no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes. Can now be cast without having to face the targeted point. Reduced cooldown from 12 to 10. Reduced  X Marks the Spot manacost from 80 to 50.  Ghostship damage and stun no longer ignore ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes.
6.78: X Marks the Spot Reduced manacost from 80/90/100/110 to 80. Reduced vision from 1000 flying to 400 ground vision. Increased  Ghostship damage from 300/400/500 to 350/450/550.
6.56: Reduced base  Strength from 24 to 21.  Torrent Reduced slow duration from 2/3/4/5 to 1/2/3/4 Increased manacost from 105 to 120.  Tidebringer Reduced radius from 425/450/475/500 to 380/420/460/500. Fixed cooldown not triggering when attacking siege creeps.  X Marks the Spot no longer returns the target if it becomes spell immune.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Increased base  strength from 21 to 24.  Ghostship Reduced cooldown from 90/80/70 to 60/50/40. Increased impact radius from 400 to 425.
6.74: Increased  Torrent radius from 200 to 215. Reduced  X Marks the Spot cooldown from 20 to 16. Increased  Ghostship stun duration from 1.2 to 1.4.
6.76: Increased  Tidebringer radius from 500 on each level to 500/500/500/600. Reduced  Ghostship flying vision from 800 to 400 and removed the 3.34 second lingering.
6.71: Return No longer requires its own ability slot and replaces X Marks the Spot while active. Changed hotkey from R to X.  Ghostship Reduced cooldown from 100 to 90. Added an ally only visual effect where ship will land. Fixed minor inaccuracies when casted from the map edges.
6.60: Reduced base  Agility and gain from 18 + 1.7 to 14 + 1.3.  X Marks the Spot is now blocked by  Linken's Sphere.
6.73: Increased  Strength gain from 2.7 to 3.0. Increased  Torrent slow from 30% to 35%. Increased  Tidebringer cleave radius from 380/420/460/500 to 500. Reduced  X Marks the Spot cooldown from 30 to 20. Increased  Ghostship allied buff duration from 5/6/7 to 8.
6.72: Reduced  Tidebringer cooldown from 16/12/8/4 to 13/10/7/4. Increased  Ghostship stun duration from 1 to 1.2.
6.79: Reduced  X Marks the Spot cooldown from 16 to 13. Increased  Ghostship damage from 350/450/550 to 400/500/600.
6.58: Fixed  Torrent slow lasting a bit longer than intended.  Ghostship Reduced Rum movement speed bonus from 30% to 10%. Increased cooldown from 100/80/60 to 100 on each level.
6.57: Reduced base  intelligence and gain from 18 + 2.2 to 16 + 1.5.  X Marks the Spot Reduced duration from 2/3/4/5 to 1/2/3/4. Reduced manacost from 110 to 80/90/100/110. Reduced cooldown from 60/50/40/30 to 30 at all levels. Added 50 manacost to the  Return sub-ability. No longer returns  Brewmaster during  Primal Split to prevent it getting canceled. Added Disable Help support. Increased  Ghostship manacost from 150 to 150/200/250.
6.67: Reduced base armor from 1 to 0 (total armor is now 1.96).
